page.title: 15Pocket Money Survey, Sheff.
page.content: We went round to each form in Beck Middle School to find out how much pocket money children aged between 8 and 12 get. Our results are as follows:- ______________________________________ IFORM ILessI 11p I 21p I 51p I More I I IthanI to I to I to I than I I I 10pI 20p I 50p I Â£1 I Â£1 I I I I I I I I ______________________________________ I 1R I 0 I 0 I 3 I 5 I 9 I I 1S I 1 I 5 I 8 I 2 I 3 I I 1T I 0 I 0 I 7 I 8 I 4 I I 2R I 2 I 3 I 2 I 8 I 8 I I 2S I 0 I 0 I 10 I 9 I 5 I I 3R I 2 I 0 I 2 I 7 I 10 I I 3S I 1 I 0 I 0 I 9 I 8 I I 3T I 0 I 0 I 3 I 2 I 10 I I 4R I 0 I 1 I 2 I 4 I 19 I I 4S I 1 I 0 I 3 I 8 I 13 I ______________________________________
